channel.title: Stocker, Thomas F. on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Stocker, Thomas F. on Chege's Blog

item.title: Thoughts on Academic Research
item.description: Going to a talk is difficult for everyone because nobody understands the whole thing, but it’s especially difficult for undergraduates because they still expect to. is a rich resource for understanding scholarly literature. Browse it. Some of the listed items are familiar, e.g. Google Scholar, SCImago, Sci-Hub, but it’d be informative to zoom out to the larger picture, e.g. good alternatives to Google Scholar. Why Even Read Papers?
